I think it’s going to be fantastic. Lots of great ideas, energy and people who seem to want to participate!

FROM: Innovation Commons First Meeting: Wednesday, October 5, 2005 | B.Mann Consulting<blockquote cite="http://www.bmannconsulting.com/blog/bmann/innovation-commons-first-meeting-wednesday-october-5-2005">The first meeting about building a local, physical space for entreprenuers, as part of the Innovation Commons (see my previous post announcing this, as well as check out the wiki) takes place on Wednesday, October 5, 2005, at Take 5 Cafe space that is being donated after hours by the owner, Dean Punzo.

There is already an impressive list of supporters – please add your name even if you can’t make it to Wednesday’s meeting.
